ing: 1 clove garlic, pressed, or more to taste
des: "A traditional Southern dish full of flavor!"
ins: Combine water, salt, and sugar in a stockpot; bring to a boil. Add turnip greens, onion, and garlic to the boiling water; cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Stir hot sauce into the mixture and cook until greens are tender, about 20 minutes more.
